info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 27 at 4:51PM MDT until July 27 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of south central New Mexico, including the following county, Dona Ana.
* WHEN...Until 645 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 451 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall of up to 0.5 inches is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Las Cruces, Dona Ana, Fairacres, East Mesa and Northeast Las Cruces. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT THIS EVENING
